name: Tapas Media, Inc.
description: Developer of an online portal designed to connect readers with writers and comic artists. The company's platform allows creators to publish their work on the website and app, helping creators gain an audience and readers with new content.
one_liner: Developer of an online portal designed to connect readers with writers and comic artists. The company's platform allows creators to publish their work on the website and app, helping creators gain an audience and readers with new content.
